modules.name: MarkovDrummer
modules.description: Probablistic trigger sequencer based of Markov chains

modules.name: MultiLogic
modules.description: Three multi-function logic gates that can each be AND,OR,XOR,NOT with inverted outputs

modules.name: EyeSeq
modules.description: Weighted sum of a clock divider

modules.name: TransQuant
modules.description: Quantiser with triggers to transpose by a CV controleable interval

modules.name: SeqOfChanges
modules.description: Markov sequencer where the probability of the next trigger is based on the previous three triggers

modules.name: RepeatBuddy
modules.description: Counter and comparator utility module capable of adding step repeat to a sequencer

modules.name: ShiftComputer
modules.description: Bank of 10 sample and holds with patch programmable control
